title: passport_ch
validationRule: PROOF FOR THIS THAT private.firstName IS EQUAL TO 'John' AND private.dateOfBirth.year IS GREATER THAN 1900 AND private.dateOfBirth.month IS GREATER THAN 1 AND LESS THAN 12 AND private.dateOfBirth.day IS LESS THAN 15 AND private.dateOfBirth.year IS LESS THAN private.expiresOn.year AND private.firstName IS UNEQUAL TO 'Jane' AND private.firstName IS PREIMAGE OF 0x01bd94c871b2d21926cf4f1c9e2fcbca8ece3353a0aac7cea8d507a9ad30afe2 AND 12 IS MEMBER OF (private.dateOfBirth.month, private.dateOfBirth.day)
